content: decorate the easter table with these nice and stylish easter bread baskets 1 the baskets 2 are crocheted with our beautiful hobbii ribbon yarn 3 and are decorated with a small leather strap this gives the baskets 4 a nice finish **materials ** - crochet hook h l /5-8 mm depending on your gauge - hobbii ribbon 5 - 4 and 3 10 and 7 5 cm leather strap 3⁄4 wide natural - 2 rivets 6x9 mm - leather punch **finished size ** large base 7 18 cm height 3 1⁄4 8 5 cm small base 4 3⁄4 12 cm height 2 1⁄2 6 5 cm **abbreviations ** **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **long-single_crochet** long single_crochet bl back loop **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **gauge ** this project can be worked with a h hook 5 0mm but the size is dependent on how tightly or loosely you crochet if the hook is too small the base will begin to curve into a bowl if this happens try a larger hook 1 https //hobbii com/ribbon-easter-bread-basket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-easter-bread-basket&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/ribbon-easter-bread-basket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-easter-bread-basket&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/ribbon-hobbii utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ribbon&utm_term=swr 4 https //hobbii com/ribbon-easter-bread-basket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ribbon-easter-bread-basket&utm_term=swr 5 https //hobbii com/ribbon-hobbii utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ribbon&utm_term=swr
